::Koj::
Koj gets behind Inu-Yasha standing back to back "You get front I have the 
back and Duck" As Koj Drops to his knees.

::Inu::
Inu lowers his head as WarMachine's missile flies over both of them."Whats 
the plan?" Stands up getting hit by Bloodstrikes fire as he gets alittle 
angry as his chest burns.

::Koj::
Koj see 8 shots coming at him Koj see a broken stasis pod door kicks it  up 
in the air and grabs it to use as a shield a as the 7 shots hit "I'm working 
on it." Koj looks at the 7 ding "I thought there" As the last one hits him 
in the chest cracking his chest plate.

::Inu::
"Not to rush but work faster Inu-Yasha Terrorize" Inu-Yasha transforms in to 
a larger dragon ((Looks Like Bahamut))

::Koj::
Ducks behind the Door again as 25 more shots pound it as he looks at the 
sand "There trying to use numbers on us to swarm and over power use your 
wings sand storm they can't hit what they can scan."

::NeoBahamut::
"So be it" NeoBahamut Reach over on his back grabs a Plasma Rifle and Locks 
on BloodStrike and WarMachine fires his Plasma Breath. Loads the Rifle and 
fires 2 blast at Zardus and Neo starts flapping his huge wings starts to 
kick up a lot of sand towards the Zardus and Co. as wind and sand start to 
become stronger wearing away rocks.

::Koj::
Koj looks at the Lighting Bolts and smiles quickly snaps the Fang together 
and spins it as pulls in the 15 lighting bolts its still resounds as if 
desires more energy. As the energy is distrubted to Koj healing his damaged 
systems closing the crack in his chest. Koj Fires 3 exploding pellets and 
Treadshot and Hurricane.Then spins the lance in reverse shoot 13 Lighting 
bolts Inzola and Stranato. Koj whispers to Neo "Heres the plan ????"
